inclusion.criterion: Children aged between 3 and 14 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Children who are accompanied by a caregiver (father, mother, legal guardian) during the procedure
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: That both the child and the caregiver understand and speak Spanish
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: That they have consented to participate in the study: in children by verbal consent and in their father, mother, legal guardian, by signing the informed consent document
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Children with sensory problems that prevent the use of RV
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Children with sensory impairment of pain perception (for example, spina bifida)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has abdominal pain lasting about 4 days accompanied by nausea and vomiting. She has a history of hypercholesterolemia and two C/sections.
